comments.author: Nabrok.9023
comments.body:
Pat Cavit.9234:

Working for me currently, still broken for you?

It was down for a few minutes, then came back up.

I’m still getting those errors though. It’s not a huge deal as I just query again and it works, just a little odd.

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body:
Still down “endpoint requires authentication”. Maybe some EU issue again?
Edit: just started working again 5 min after I posted.

comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body: Working for me currently, still broken for you?

comments.author: Nabrok.9023
comments.body: /v2/account now seems to be down completely.

comments.author: Nabrok.9023
comments.body:
I’m occasionally getting some strange endpoint requires authentication errors on /v2/account even though valid API keys are provided.

I have manually checked the keys after getting the error, and they have worked.

If I get this error I set my app to retry it after 1 second up to 5 times. It has always succeeded on the second attempt.

I also got one “requires account scope” error, which is odd as I don’t think you can create a key that doesn’t have account scope. Again, this key worked on a second attempt.
